info.name: framerate dispersion 2
info.description:
red: histogram of iTimeDelta
green: histogram of manual count time - prev_time.  Should be identical (i.e. yellow)
Blue: 16.66 ms, corresponding to 60 fps.
At least on linux OpenGL, consistant Gaussian dispersion around 60fps (not shown in fps counter)
